backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing persistent storage for songs, voice samples, personas, covers, and lyrics requests with CRUD operations and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: persona-first workflow navigation, social media sharing in Library, Facebook sharing integration, and YouTube upload integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, hooks, and configuration files describing their functionality and integration points.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with warm orange-to-red gradient palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference for the React application titled 'AI Voice Cover App'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component orchestrating multi-view navigation (create/library/personas), persona-first workflow with conditional step skipping, and state management for cover and generation modes.
frontend/src/components/AudioPlayer.tsx: Fixed-position audio player component with play/pause controls, seek slider, volume control, time display, and close button for playing songs from the library.
frontend/src/components/DownloadButton.t: A React component that downloads audio files (MP3 or WAV) from an ExternalBlob, handling format conversion, filename normalization, and displaying loading states with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/FormatSelector.t: A radio group component for selecting audio download format (MP3 or WAV) with visual labels describing compression vs quality tradeoffs.
frontend/src/components/GenerationMode.t: Handles the lyrics-to-song generation workflow by accepting a voice sample ID, collecting lyrics via LyricsInput, and submitting a generation request to the backend actor.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout component with header, navigation tabs (Create/Library/Personas), background styling, and GitHub link. Provides view switching functionality.
frontend/src/components/Library.tsx: Displays user's song library with play/pause controls, format selection, download options, and social sharing. Integrates AudioPlayer and manages playback state for multiple songs.
frontend/src/components/LyricsInput.tsx: A textarea component for entering song lyrics with character count validation (20-2000 chars), placeholder text, and a submit button that triggers song generation.
frontend/src/components/ModeSelector.tsx: Initial mode selection screen offering two creation paths: 'Cover a Song' (upload existing audio) or 'Generate from Lyrics' (AI composition from text).
frontend/src/components/Personas.tsx: Manages voice personas with create, delete, and select functionality. Displays a list of user personas with voice samples and provides a dialog for creating new personas with name and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/ProcessingStatus: Displays processing progress for both cover and generation workflows with stage-by-stage visualization. Polls processing/generation status and triggers completion callback when finished.
frontend/src/components/SocialShare.tsx: Provides social sharing functionality for songs via Facebook and YouTube. Opens Facebook share dialog and YouTube upload dialog with Web Share API fallback.
frontend/src/components/SongUpload.tsx: Handles song file upload with metadata input (title, artist) and progress tracking. Validates audio file types (MP3, WAV, M4A) and uploads to backend actor.
frontend/src/components/VoiceInput.tsx: Provides a toggle between recording and uploading voice samples. Acts as a wrapper component that renders either VoiceRecorder or VoiceUpload based on user selection.
frontend/src/components/VoiceRecorder.ts: Records audio from microphone with real-time duration and audio level visualization. Uploads recorded audio as voice sample to backend with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/VoiceUpload.tsx: React component for uploading voice samples with file validation (MP3/WAV/M4A, max 50MB), progress tracking, and integration with the backend actor to store uploaded voice data.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeUploadDia: Dialog component for configuring and uploading songs to YouTube with title, description, and privacy settings; currently shows a placeholder UI with instructions for manual upload since OAuth2 integration is not implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: Custom hook providing audio playback controls (play/pause, seek, volume) with state management for current time, duration, loading status, and event handling for an HTML5 Audio element.
frontend/src/hooks/useGenerationStatus.t: Hook that simulates multi-stage song generation progress (analyzing, composing, synthesizing, mixing, mastering) with smooth progress updates and returns a generated cover ID upon completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options for idle behavior and derivation origin.
frontend/src/hooks/useProcessingStatus.t: Hook that orchestrates multi-stage audio processing with progress tracking, simulates processing delays, and creates a cover record in the backend with a dummy audio file upon completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including covers, lyrics requests, user libraries, and voice personas, with automatic polling for pending requests and cache invalidation on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceRecorder.ts: Custom React hook that manages voice recording using MediaRecorder API, tracks recording duration and audio levels via Web Audio API, and returns recording state and control functions.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file with Tailwind directives and custom CSS variables defining a comprehensive design system with light/dark theme support using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining an AI voice cover app with architectural notes about free-to-use constraints, audio processing pipeline, voice cloning, and a list of existing features and known issues including broken audio downloads.
